level.heading: Rules and regulations.
level.text: The Chief Financial Officer is authorized to promulgate rules and regulations necessary for the efficient administration of this subchapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 20-61 substituted "Chief Financial Officer" for "Mayor."

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Recorder of Deeds Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-381, June 6, 2002, 49 DCR 5674).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Related Amendments Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-456, July 23, 2002, 49 DCR 8107).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Related Amendments Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-510, October 23, 2002, 49 DCR 10247).

level.heading: Temporary Repeal of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Recorder of Deeds Temporary Act of 2002 (D.C. Law 14-191, October 5, 2002, law notification 49 DCR 9549).
For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 12(d) of Tax Clarity and Related Amendments Temporary Act of 2003 (D.C. Law 14-228, March 23, 2003, law notification 50 DCR 2741).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7342(d) of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-130, July 30, 2013, 60 DCR 11384, 20 DCSTAT 1827).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7342(d) of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-204, October 17, 2013, 60 DCR 15341, 20 DCSTAT 2311).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-17
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-17, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-441.

level.heading: Short Title
level.text: Section 7341 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that Subtitle HH of Title VII of the act may be cited as the "Multistate Tax Compact Enactment and Clarification Act of 2013".

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 4-17, see Mayor's Order 86-145, August 25, 1986.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-61: Section 7343 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that § 7342 of the act shall apply as for tax years beginning after December 31, 2012.
